---
format: 
  pdf:
    mainfont: Comic Sans MS
    fontsize: 20pt
    classoption: [landscape]
    include-in-header: 
      text: |
        \usepackage{mdframed}
          \mdfdefinestyle{myframe}{%
          linecolor=red,
          linewidth=8pt,
          innertopmargin=0pt,
          innerbottommargin=0pt,
          innerrightmargin=0pt,
          innerleftmargin=0pt
          }
        \usepackage[dvipsnames]{xcolor}
  
    geometry:
      - top=20mm
      - left=30mm
      - right=30mm
      - bottom=20mm

editor: visual
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
greeting <- "Merry Catmas!"

to <- "Ross"
from <- "Neptune"
message <- "Thanks for always playing with me! <3"

# must be a colour recognized by dvipsnames
# https://www.overleaf.com/learn/latex/Using_colours_in_LaTeX
text_col <- "OliveGreen"
```

\centerline{\textcolor{`r text_col`}{`r greeting`}}

```{=tex}

\newcommand\header[1]{
  \newlength{\headerwidth}
  \setlength{\headerwidth}{\widthof{#1}}
  \addtolength{\headerwidth}{14pt}
  \begin{mdframed}[style=myframe, nobreak=true, align=center, userdefinedwidth=\headerwidth]#1
  
  \end{mdframed}
}

\header{\includegraphics[width=20cm, height=11cm]{images/christmas_kitty.jpg}}
```

\centerline{\textcolor{`r text_col`}{To: `r to`}}

\centerline{\textcolor{`r text_col`}{From: `r from`}}

\centerline{\textcolor{`r text_col`}{`r message`}}
